Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, lot of programs to configure and really easy to use for a begginer like me. Really powerful zoom

Reviews.Title: Nikon p520
Reviews.Author: MOHD AL FADHALA
Reviews.Content: As a compact camera it is good, i took more than 300 photo in Paris,evel tower,desny land,versi palace and the museum and got very good pictures even in low light.the Wi-Fi WU-1a accessory  i bought from Japan ($50) is good i am using it  for my Nikon D7000 as well  and transfare photo to my computer and my iphone.so i recommend this camera

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Anonymous "N. Haight"
Reviews.Content: The zoom is amazing!! The photos have amazing clarity. Buy a large capacity memory card. I use this at all my daughter's sports games!

Reviews.Title: coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have just started using the camera...I SOOO LOVE IT!!! I am still learning...cant wait till i know everything about it!!! :-)

Reviews.Title: Incredible photographs
Reviews.Author: Brian James
Reviews.Content: Nice zoom features and awesome resolution. Bought this for my mother-in-law for Christmas and my wife loved it so much that I bought her one for her birthday. We took it on a cruise and were taking pictures of Jamaica from the cruiseship using the zoom, you would have thought we were across the street from some of the buildings and people we were taking pictures of. Ordered the AmazonBasics fixed zoom camera case and it fits like a glove with the strap attached. Can't beat the zoom feature and picture quality in this price range.

Reviews.Title: It's Perfect...
Reviews.Author: Shajib Haq Rahman
Reviews.Content: Well I bought lots of products from Amazon and almost all of them I Loved.. This Camera is Good.. Quality is very good.. Clean.. High Quality.. All the Pictures taken by the camera is superb.. I recommended it to any body who is not a professional camera man but like or love to take pictures...

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Carlos Saborio Badilla "C. Ivan"
Reviews.Content: This little baby is awesome! Im really impressed with the Zoom, usually when you take pictures the images are blurry and low quality, this camera makes it look like I was right next to what ever I shoot.It could be better in low light conditions but overall Im really satisfied with it.Great point and shoot camera but also comes with some pro features.

Reviews.Title: hate luging gear
Reviews.Author: Thomas Seasholtz
Reviews.Content: the nikon p520 is what i like. no extra gear to lug around. great vido with pause great feacher.and a long reach 1000 mm. must i say more tom

Reviews.Title: LOVE this camera !!!
Reviews.Author: C Lee
Reviews.Content: I finally took the big step up from a pocket camera to this one and I am so very glad I did. The small camera was great for being able to take pictures whenever and where ever I went. With this camera I have to think ahead and be sure it's with me. No big deal... my phone can take photos when I don't have this camera with me. For those moments I can anticipate, this camera is fantastic!!! The photos are beautiful. It's easy to get started quickly with the auto setting. It can be as simple or as complicated as you want. I think it is a great camera for learning about photography and all the settings and options available on high-end cameras. I look forward to learning more and taking more creatively spectacular photos.

Reviews.Title: not impressed
Reviews.Author: GK "genkup"
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for my trip to Europe. I didn't want to spend too much money, so I purchased a refurbished one. It turned out the charging device inside the camera didn't work. It came with a fully charged battery, which lasted for the 1st 2 days. Then I had to switch to my cell phone camera. I returned the camera after the trip.I wasn't impressed with picture quality either. They are OK, but not great. I expected more from an 18 MP camera.I gave it 2 stars because it worked for the full 2 days.

Reviews.Title: A Lot More Camera Than I Expected
Reviews.Author: P. Williams
Reviews.Content: The P-250 is a lot more camera than expected. As soon as I master a capability the camera has I discover even more functions that are even more useful. I purchased the P250 for an upcoming trip to Alaska knowing the big zoom capability would be a big plus but now expect this camera to be an all around great camera. While it's not magic in the point and shoot mode, it can produce outstanding images with the proper settings.

Reviews.Title: Nikon CoolPix P520 18.1 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very crisp pictures and the zoom works great. This camera has image stabilization too. The movie functionworked well too.The only thing is that it is a little slow to start up and has no manual focus ring - but you can assign the side zoom control to do manual focus.The camera is slow to store the image just taken.I like to take pictures of aircraft that fly over my house, due to the longer picture storage time, I only get to take one.This camera does great if you can put it next to stationary pole or something while taking a high flying aircraft witha contrail.This is a great snap shot camera too.

Reviews.Title: My first nice camera
Reviews.Author: Ford guy
Reviews.Content: Have always played with photography but nothing serious.  Decided to step it up a few notches with this Nikon P-520.  Am very happy with the initial results.  Took pictures of the the lunar eclipse in April with fantastic results.  Have even signed up for a photography course at a local college

Reviews.Title: Electromax is a GREAT Amazon Dealer
Reviews.Author: Keith E. Nelson "Keith & Diane"
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera and after I got it and tried it, did some research, decided I wanted to "upgrade" to a Coolpix P600.  Electromax was very professional in handling my return.  I will definitely do business with them again.  Thank you, Electromax :)Diane Nelson

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: michael mccall
Reviews.Content: This camera is like a brand new one. I haven't gotten to used it totally yet,but just a few pic's I've taken were absolutely beautiful.

Reviews.Title: slow
Reviews.Author: David O'Neil
Reviews.Content: The zoom is nice.  But the autofocus is really slow.  I use the zoom to creep up on wildlife.  But it is often too slow to get the moment I'm trying to capture.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Jacob Bramm
Reviews.Content: The image stabilization isn't all that it's cracked out to be; when you're zoomed in most or all of the way, things get a little blurry.  Otherwise, it's the most applicable camera for our needs.  Recreational photographers just looking to take photos randomly, at events like baseball games or on trips of the scenery.

Reviews.Title: Super zoom
Reviews.Author: J. Gochenouer "loves the outdoors"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera that in some ways outperforms my D600. Near professional quality and a very bargain price. Too bad that it won't output Raw files but the zoom is amazing for such a little camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Starter camera for amateurs seeking professional results
Reviews.Author: Christina Dvorak
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in September 2013, after recieving my financial aide return while in college. I was looking for a moderately priced, decent quality camera to use in the early stages of my development from a hobbyist to a professional. I work in performance photography, though I also work the occasional wedding or personal shoot.From distances of up to 40 ft away, through smoke and fog machines, you really can't argue with the performance of this camera. I shoot from the sky most of the time, and despite interference from the environment, I get my shot every time.

Reviews.Title: Great fit
Reviews.Author: Thomas G. Malone
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with this purchase.  It was as advertised and I like the feature of 2 separate zip pockets on either side of the bag.

Reviews.Title: Great everyday camera!
Reviews.Author: Christie Park
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a camera for a long time and I have fallen in love with this camera.  I am still working out all of the little bugs but this is a great point ad shoot camera!  I use it to take photos of my kids playing lacrosse and football.  The picture quality is really impressive and the battery life is much better than I expected!  I highly recommend this camera and the price point is fantastic as well!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely awesome!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Augustine
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time. Exactly as described. Brand new and perfectly the best. I just loooooooooooooooooooooove Nikon. First time buying this camera and I don't regret it. If there are any bad updates, I'll let you know. But this camera is amazing and I would definitely recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: Allen R. Myers Jr. "armsam"
Reviews.Content: Nice camera takes great photo's with the zoom. Battery life is very good.Love the flip, tilt and view screen for the best shots.

Reviews.Title: Awsome camera
Reviews.Author: pure.made
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and I'm totally in love with it. It's by far on of the best cameras I have bought. The quality of the pictures are amazing and the video quality are stunning. I'm 100% satisfied with this product and I highly recommend it...

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: victor zuber/susan zuber
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera that is both easy to use and yet can offer the flexibility to use it manually.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Patrick L Cote
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. I was looking for a good camera with a 42x zoom lens for my private investigation business.

Reviews.Title: OK in general but not so good for wildlife
Reviews.Author: Jack Gentle, Jr.
Reviews.Content: Camera has very good glass and can take very nice photos.But lens zoom is too slow. Focus is too slow and won't focus on something mostly grey, like a small grey bird. Shutter lag is too slow so if subject is active, you won't get what you intended when you pressed the shutter release button. Manual focus is basically unusable for wildlife photography.Very nice camera for general walk-around photography but disappointing for wildlife, unless subject is stationary.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it
Reviews.Author: joey boy
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures and works fine...took a little for her to get used to it...but she loves it...Thank goodness, never hear the end if she _____________!!!

Reviews.Title: One of the BEST!
Reviews.Author: Ole organic farmer "Micheal W. Adkins SR."
Reviews.Content: Since I have the love for taking pics of wild life, I made the choice to spend a little extra money to improve the quality of my photos! Not only has it made a huge difference in the photos but with the GPS turnned on, you don't have to keep stopping to write down where you where when you took the pics....In 1 word, Fantastic

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: A. Brown
Reviews.Content: it takes amazing photos of my artwork, can't wait to take it on my vacation! I absolutely recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Not good for high speed
Reviews.Author: SAKunz
Reviews.Content: One of reasons I bought this camera is because I wanted good action shots. I am not getting the results I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Great 1st time DSLR camera.
Reviews.Author: James Jeter
Reviews.Content: After reading the many reviews from several sites about the camera I decided to buy it.  I purchased this from Amazon because of the price and  freebies included and off course free shipping because of Amazon Prime.Since this is my 1st DSLR camera I suspect some of the problems I am having are user error.  I do agree with most reviewers that the camera takes a bit of time to focus when using the zoom feature.  The battery life has been very good.  I am enjoying using the many features of the camera and have captured several fantastic photos.  I love this camera.

Reviews.Title: My Third Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Shara
Reviews.Content: Love the 42X Zoom Lens, compact good battery life with rechargeable lithium batteries, red case instead of black, etc.Also like the ease of operation and the new adjustable viewing screen that can be folded back on itself protecting the screen.

Reviews.Title: Good, but spends too much battery
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The quality of the image is good, there's a lot of controls to help you make that goodlooking photo.But, for me, it spends to much battery, especially if you turn the GPS function ON. It drains you battery very quick (half a day of shooting). The zoom is not manual, so every move uses the battery juice. If you turn the camera off, the zoom is drawn back, with the battery's juice.There's not real manual Focus. For me, it is important. I like to be abble of focusing on my own.So, I returned it and purchased a Fujifilm Finepix HS50exr. Much better in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tony Fasani
Reviews.Content: Great for beginners and advanced photographers. Easy to use. Delivery was on time and as advertised. Takes great action shots and movies as well.

Reviews.Title: very surprised
Reviews.Author: TOMMY G.
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera for the novice. I would recommend this product to all my family and friends.  Very nic nikon

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Wayne Morris
Reviews.Content: Took the word of a friend and wee are not disappointed  here. Quality pictures. A great zoom. The battery life seems to last to.

Reviews.Title: Great zoom!!!
Reviews.Author: Hidalgo
Reviews.Content: Great camera, excelent options, perfect quality image. The only problem is the filter adapter kind of hard to install, I'm affraid to damage the objectif.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: just me
Reviews.Content: We have loved this camera. The wide variety of settings combined with the awesome optical zoom are amazing.We have been happy with its performance for both interior and exterior shots. I have been able to take great shots at tremendous distances while visiting national parks. Although the zoom may take a second to autofocus, I have still managed to get great shots. It has also made some great pics when we were at a hockey game and I was shooting from near the other net. (We looked at the photos just last night and you could see the goalies facial expression behind the mask.)I have recommended this camera and the P510 to both my brother and my girlfriend. They have been extremely happy with the camera from it's ease of use to its great picture quality. (Yeah I know its not an SLR but I didn't pay for an SLR so I am fine with that)I bought two extra batteries and a wall charger for under $20 dollars so I do not do the plug in and charge the camera routine. That did seem like a pain.Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: what a nice camera???
Reviews.Author: kimathi
Reviews.Content: This an awesome camera. Have used this camera for the last one week and really works very well, very nice photos and videos.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Max Fox
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It feels solid, its easy to use and the pictures come out amazing. I thought for the price, its perfect.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix Cameta
Reviews.Author: Sheri Martin
Reviews.Content: Love this camera!  This camera is easy to use, takes great photos and I adore the fact it came in red!

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Víctor Ordaz Rojas
Reviews.Content: it's perfect i love it. on two moths i want to buy the accesories. thank amazon for your responsability .

Reviews.Title: All was very good
Reviews.Author: Santiago González Hidalgo
Reviews.Content: All good with the camera is an excelent product. I recomended it for all the buyers of Amazon. Is an excelent camera and a good price

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix P520
Reviews.Author: Tim G.
Reviews.Content: To keep it simple this camera is most all of what it is advertised to be.  A couple of things that improve on it.....  A lens threaded for filters - no such provisions.  Also, provisions for an electronic remote shutter release would be of great aid when the lens is all the way out.  I would hope to see these added features on a next upgrade to this model by Nikon.

Reviews.Title: It is all that is advertised.
Reviews.Author: Eric Robinson
Reviews.Content: Amateur here. This was a Christmas gift to a sophomore that wanted a "professional" camera. She is very tech savy & loves this camera.Dad on the other hand still has his old Nikon equipment, no older, not digital. It was called film then, pretty cool, lots of process, but still some great photographs.Today Dad did not want her to lose lenses & caps and light meters (really) so this was our choice.She's happy, Dad is happy & it does take very good photographs.We have good printers, but not great printers so we are very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great for the avid picture taker - not yet a armature photographer
Reviews.Author: pat-93
Reviews.Content: I am a photographer who shoots with a Nikon DSLR. I bought this camera for my sister who likes to take pictures but does not want to use a huge piece of equipment. So after looking around I decided to get her the P520. The swivel screen, large MP and the 42X zoom made my sister happy.. the Nikon Lens, possessor and other special functions make me happy.It is a great camera! I love it and I think you will to.

Reviews.Title: Getting to like it.
Reviews.Author: jl
Reviews.Content: When I first got this camera, I was a little disappointed by some of its features, but the more I learn to use it, the more I like it. I carry it as a companion to my Nikon 7000 and use it for great close up pictures, insects and the like and far away zoom pictures.

Reviews.Title: More than worth the Price.
Reviews.Author: Judy Crawford "Judy Crawford"
Reviews.Content: This item was a gift for another person but since I have one two generations earlier, I was able to play with it to quickly get an opinion on it's features and improvements. Everything about it is much better than my version... good clear, sharp, true to color photos and easy to use.My only complaint would be that it is still sometimes difficult to focus/see what you are trying to get a pic of, either with the view finder or LED screen.All in all, I love it, my friend, who is right next door where I can continue to see how it performs, loves it. It's more than worth the price I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Not really very good
Reviews.Author: Grumpybear "grumpybear"
Reviews.Content: Just took on a European vacation thought it would be ideal for travel pics.  On-off button and shutter button worked intermittently making it unreliable and difficult to grab a quick photo of something.  Focus is not so bad as to be called soft, but it isn't sharp and crisp.  Battery life was usually good, but went dead without any warning.  Most photos needed Photoshop work before printing because they were very flat and dull.  I'm comparing this to my wife's Panasonic which was reliable, took sharp bright photos which didn't need any preprinting work.  To say I'm disappointed is an understatement, I'm going back to my 3-year-old Canon.

Reviews.Title: Wide zoomer
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Billman
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it much, but it works and looks great. I love the wide zoom. It will come in handy.

Reviews.Title: Bad Focusing
Reviews.Author: Michael Davis
Reviews.Content: Camera looks nice but does not work as it shouldIf you zoom the camera tries to focus for some time and then indicates that it can not focusOr it shows that it is in focus, but after you transfer images to computer many images are not in focus

Reviews.Title: just right
Reviews.Author: Misia
Reviews.Content: A good entry level camera for anybody with an interest in photography. The included software is very limited, but offers basic functions.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA  EXCELLANT  SERVICE
Reviews.Author: RONALD J RUBINO
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA  WAS A CHRISTMAS GIFT  FOR MY  SON I OWN THE  500 P  AND IT S A GREAT CAMERA  ALSO

Reviews.Title: camera bag and memory card
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera, I was suppose to receive a camera case and a memory card which is why I decided to order from amazon and  not the other one I was looking at. I never received it and was wondering it's status??

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: James Parker
Reviews.Content: Pictures are bright & crisp.  Burst mode is great but need the right SD card to be fast enough to keep up.

Reviews.Title: nice camera, good price
Reviews.Author: Daniel Taylor
Reviews.Content: Camera is fine.  I didn't expect the metallic red color, but I like it.  Different.It would have been helpful if you'd specified that the package included a rechargeable battery and charging unit.  Not being sure about this, I ordered, separately, a charger and two extra batteries, for $20.  I didn't need to spend this extra money, guys!

Reviews.Title: The camera is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Rafaella Ferrer
Reviews.Content: The camera is amazing! I was looking for a professional one, but I chose this one and I'm not disappointed at all. It's the perfect camera for those who wants a super quality but not a complicated professional camera.

Reviews.Title: It's a great camera
Reviews.Author: Golcar Rojas
Reviews.Content: I was really amazed about my new camera. It worked perfectly. Shamefully thiefs got in to my house and stole it a few days after I got my camera with me. I will soon purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: victor alcantara
Reviews.Content: This camera takes excellent pictures!! Makes the pictures look professional in my eyes!! Decent price unlike most cameras of this caliper!!!

Reviews.Title: MY RATINGS ON THE NIKON 18.1 MEGA PIXELS
Reviews.Author: Hallam Alleyne
Reviews.Content: I saw it advertised on CNN internet news. I recommended it to a cousin ,who eventually purchased a Nikon 14megapixel. what other accessories eg Lenses similair to 55-200mm lenses,cleaning instruments for the lenses. The technolgy I am getting familiar with.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: dorisah
Reviews.Content: Love the pictures that it takes.  The zoom is great.  Used it at a museum without the flash and the pictures came out OK.  Manual on operation is limited.  website is no better.  Have to figure out a lot on your own.

Reviews.Title: Overall it is fine
Reviews.Author: Krishna Kishore
Reviews.Content: It is Good. I like it.Of course there will be some points to note :1) There is no gravity feature (Auto-rotate the photo when you rotate the camera).2) Have to switch on the camera, even for viewing the photos that we took already.Other than the above, I didn't find any issues with the camera. I didnt use GPS feature till now.

Reviews.Title: Camera met all my expectations
Reviews.Author: Steve Lentz
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Alaska and have thus far taken over 2000 pictures. I'm by no means a pro but the pictures have great color, the camera is easy to use and has some nice features. Only concerns are that the response  in continuous mode seems a little slow and the battery strength indicator doesn't seem to work well (or at all). Overall a nice bridge camera that I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excessive image noise
Reviews.Author: Gordon
Reviews.Content: Nikon did just about everything right with this camera except the image sensor.  The myriad functions are a delight....but useless with such poor image quality.  Even using the lowest ISO setting, the noise levels are unacceptable. Some of the noise problem is the inferior jpeg compression used in the camera and to add insult to injury, there is no RAW image option.  If an indistinct, poorly detailed image is acceptable to you, then you will love this camera!!  Nikon just tried to get too much out of a very small image sensor.  The P510, predecessor to the P520, seems to produce a much cleaner image at 16 megapixels, vs. the P520 at 18 megapixels.

Reviews.Title: Not Ready for Video
Reviews.Author: Stephen Ryan "aerialshooter"
Reviews.Content: I am a pro photographer and teach college level photography.  I am very familiar with many cameras and have owned many Nikon.  The Nikon P520 which I just purchased has too many problems. First, when recording video EVERY time the zoom is used it goes out of focus momentarily, a lot. This is not remedied by changing to the AF-S, AF-F, or turning off auto focus. Second, the manual focus feature in video does not work and can not be applied, i. e., the bad auto focus can not be turned off.  Third, while recording video the camera went badly out of focus on 3 different occasions and never could find focus.  I had to turn the camera off and then reboot it before it could again find focus.  I have been a pro for 29 years, I know of what I speak.Follow up to initial post: I have been in discussion with Nikon and the final word from them is that the camera will always go out of focus momentarily when in video record mode and the zoom is adjusted.AMEND:  See my post dated June 6, 2013.  After extensive use of this camera in still mode I am changing my rating.  It is a very good still camera.  See my June 6 review on my frustration with Nikon and why I previously gave this camera 1 star.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy from EPICDEALS
Reviews.Author: James Callahan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera from EPICDEALS.  It was listed as new.  When the camera arrived it was packaged in a generic white box with a poor quality lazer printed label glued to the box that depicted the camera and some Nikon graphics.  The only reason to not include the factory box is because the item is either counterfeit or refurbished.  I sent them EPICDEALS an e-mail and this is the response:"we sell new camera in bulk pack that's way they are in whit box and how we can sell them ata lower price if you do not like it and want to send it back we can send you out a USPS lable and we will pay to get the camera back but the camera in new in white box thats how we can get it at a lower price and please let us know what you wold like us to do to keep you happy with us"Obviously, not a reputable dealer.  This reminds me of the spam/scam e-mails from the Nigerian prince who attempts to defraud you from an internet cafe several thousand miles away.  Amazon claims to care and protect the consumers who use their website.  Ceasing to do business with EPICDEALS would be prudent business practice.  I'm not sure I trust Amazon after this transaction and doubt I will utilize their website again.

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix P520
Reviews.Author: B Zimmer
Reviews.Content: Got this camera on recommendation of a relative.  I needed something better than my little point and shoot camera for my trip to China.  This is very easy to use, has an LCD screen and view finder.  It has a 42x zoom.  I tried it out on my granddaughter's school program.  It's always difficult to get good pictures in the school gym because of the size of the room and the lighting.  Pictured turned out great.  I also videoed from near the back of the room the song she had a part in.  Came through very good.  It's easy to down load the pictures to the computer.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Regiane Blanco
Reviews.Content: I loved

Reviews.Title: It Just doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Diego Martin Perez
Reviews.Content: The camera is absolutely dead. I have followed the instructions step by step. I have charged the battery until the charger indicated green light for full charge and nothing. Even when I plug the cord as the Manual indicates, there are not lights, not movement nothing.On the other hand, the delivery was delayed by 2 extra days.I'm absolutely disappointed since I was waiting for this camera for a gift and it is not working at all.I will return this back and I will back here to provide a feedback of the "returning experience".I would not recommend to buy anything to this seller so far.

Reviews.Title: Do yourself a favor and try a different camera
Reviews.Author: Robert S Jones
Reviews.Content: I picked up this camera as a Christmas gift for my wife.  The first few shots out of the box were great - mostly stills, between 3 and 15 feet away, indoors with ideal lighting.  If that's the kind of photography you're planning on doing, this is your camera.  Outdoor shots, less than ideal lighting, or anything requiring even minimal zoom were basically worthless.  This camera will not focus in dim or dark lighting, and will not focus when zoomed.  We even tried a tripod, but it just couldn't handle it.  Kind of a shame - the zoom lens on this camera is pretty impressive, but the software just isn't up for the job.  My iPhone camera blows away the P520 in most situations.  We gave this thing an honest try for about 3 weeks, then ordered a Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ200.  The plan was to do a side-by-side comparison of the two and return the lesser camera.  The Lumix blew away the Coolpix in every single area.  Crisp, clear shots day or night, zoomed or close up, handheld or tripod.  Needless to say the Coolpix P520 was returned a week or so after we got the Lumix.  This camera WILL disappoint you - I definitely would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: I just received the product , everything is in perfect condition, the truth is an excellent camera , I am very happy with the pr
Reviews.Author: Carlos Andres Beltran Galindo
Reviews.Content: I just received the product , everything is in perfect condition, the truth is an excellent camera , I am very happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Roberto Shaw
Reviews.Content: I got it for my fiance for christmas and gave it to her early. I can not believe the quality difference for the better in this product compared to her last camera. Very good product.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: John Stuart
Reviews.Content: The long zoom lens works rally well but you have to hold it steady.Still trying to get the GPS to work.Everything else is great.I will keep it for a long time and use it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Nikon P520
Reviews.Author: Stan Arnold
Reviews.Content: The camera appeared to be in good condition and good working order.  However, it had neither a carrying strap or lens cap with it.  I'm not bothered by the lack of strap, but to me the lens cap is an integral part of camera protection, and I was annoyed that one did not come with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Asantha C. Dharmaratne "freefall"
Reviews.Content: Really amazed by the zooming power and the quality of the pictures. Lens cap is giving me a hard time, but other than that. this is really good.

Reviews.Title: excellent equipment and definition
Reviews.Author: Sertec
Reviews.Content: excellent equipment and definition. Display is very comfortable, and the eye graduation adjustment in the visor  is wonderful. Exceptional video quality.

Reviews.Title: The best bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Print Doctor
Reviews.Content: Did a lot of homework first. Remarkable zoom for the money, easy vacation camera as long as you aren't looking for a pocketable style. No interchangeable lenses to haul around or fiddle with. Up to 16 megapixel lets you do some serious cropping and still get nice clear prints even at 8x10. Ability to switch from screen to view finder is a plus in real bright light, but the screen still lets you see enough detail to frame things up in fairly bright light. Get extra batteries if you are a serious amateur shutterbug, especially in cold weather. But that's true for any rechargeable lithium system. I keep 5 charged batteries with me when on vacation. Usually only need 2 or 3 in a day, but I like the elbow room, knowing there's plenty to spare.

Reviews.Title: Poor zoom issues
Reviews.Author: James Coffey
Reviews.Content: This camera was supposed to provide great close ups with perfect clarity.  If you want close ups of any product or photo, standing 5-10 feet from the object the photo on the screen turns blurry when using the zoom, and it is near impossible to get a quality close up.  After multiple inquiries to Nikon, I give up.  They never offer any solutions, except to say you're too close to the object .. "DUH".

Reviews.Title: Very happy niece
Reviews.Author: EVazquez "NYer"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 16-year old niece who is a beginner photographer.  She cried when she opened her Christmas gift.  The camera does everything she wanted it to do.  Sorry that I cannot say more - I am not the user of the camera.

Reviews.Title: After a few weeks, the zoom doesn't work. Nice...
Reviews.Author: S. C. Dixon Photography "D. J. DiAblo"
Reviews.Content: I've been using Nikon products as a pro for over 40 years...I've NEVER had a Nikon break down unless it was dropped/damaged. This little camera has had very little use and already the zoom doesn't function. I'll return it and buy Fujifilm products.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: BigBeefy85
Reviews.Content: Package was deliveried on time and in amazing condition. Met all expectations. Would definitely recommend for anyone in the future

Reviews.Title: It is a pity.
Reviews.Author: chengrong wen
Reviews.Content: I like it, but it is a pity that I returned it. After I did it, I'm very regretful for that.

Reviews.Title: dont really like it
Reviews.Author: julio Aguilar
Reviews.Content: it  does not works at i was told, after having it recording for a couple of minutes shot off, and it did it multiple times.

Reviews.Title: Zoom issues
Reviews.Author: james Fineout
Reviews.Content: When zooming in,  the focus is not as good as it could be , I have taken a couple of thousand photos

Reviews.Title: Love the camera, but not Nikon
Reviews.Author: Karen Owens
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera. My first experience with Nikon. Would have rated it a 5, except I've had very poor experience with Nikon customer service. The photo software that came with the camera has never worked. I contacted Nikon on 3 different occasions to try and resolve issue. They insisted there is a problem with my computer...well why does my Kodak software work perfectly fine with the Nikon camera? There is a definite problem with the Nikon NX2 software, but rather than work with me try to fix the problem, customer service found it easier to blame my computer, and called it a day. I'm quite disappointed with that type of service, and will shop around for my next camera purchase.

Reviews.Title: Where is promised card and bag?
Reviews.Author: Stephen Zagelow
Reviews.Content: Camera is great as ordered. Purchased 12/1/13 and pricing correct.  But, I never received the card and camera case as promised.  The order confirmation reads: " Free Memory Card and Bag with the Purchase of this Camera.  Purchase the Nikon COOLPIX P520and get and AmazonBasics compact camera case."  How do you contact someone to talk to or when can I expect the card and bag?

Reviews.Title: Love Nikon
Reviews.Author: Sheran K Becker
Reviews.Content: Nikon's are the best. This is my 5th Nikon camera, I wouldn't buy any other brand. Easy to use and great picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Monte
Reviews.Content: Met my expectations, still trying to learn many of the functions, My main concern is the battery life, but so far all is great.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix p520
Reviews.Author: hedgehog0123
Reviews.Content: Bought this back in November from here, just came around to using it since I was a bit too busy before. Horrible camera! It has awesome manufacturers advertisements and all but in reality it is cheapish looking, the color is way lighter than in the picture and has poor quality. Want to return it but since I bought it off of my other account and cannot find log in info for it don't know how to. The plastic attachments at the end of straps broke the third day of barely any usage even which totally upset me! I thought much better of it until started using, if you want a simple digital camera go with the cheap $80 ones because this one is the same exact as that! Also my box came in all damaged up like someone tried beating it up and I was even scared to open it because I though the screen might be cracked, but it was fine inside.

Reviews.Title: Horrible instrument
Reviews.Author: F. Pryor
Reviews.Content: The autofocus shutter lag is horrendous and the camera locks up after each and every shot to show you what you've captured on the display, even if you tell it NOT to do that in the menu options.Autofocus itself is slow as molasses, hunts and searches from near to infinity except for the contrastiest of subjects.The eyepiece viewfinder is tiny and all but unusable; absolutely so if you wear glasses.The images it captures may be fine, but good luck capturing them.One star is too many.

Reviews.Title: Nice Replacement for P500.
Reviews.Author: Harry O.
Reviews.Content: My wife purchased a P500 several months back.  It developed a problem in that it would take one picture and then turn itself off.  Sent to Nikon via an authorized repair shop in Jacksonville.  Estimate to repair substantial part of purchasing a newer, updated version with many of the same basic features my wife liked, plus some updates like the wireless transfer of pics to smart phones, etc.  Will try the new P520 out during a visit to Disney World soon.

Reviews.Title: Botched Order and duplicate charges not good
Reviews.Author: William Cottringer. Ph.D.
Reviews.Content: Why in the world would I want to buy something else from an order that was dreadfully botched up. on 12/29/30 I ordered this Nikon CoolPix P520 and compact bag. On 12/30/13 my credit card contained charges for 2 cameras (ordered 1), 2 bags (ordered1)and a 16 gig memory card (did not order) for a total of $784.16 when the total was $383.50. Now I have to return the oneextra camera that I got yesterday 12/30/13 at my inconvenience, and then when I get the second package, this evening or January 2, 2014, with the other camera bag and memory card, which I didn't order, I will have to againre-box the items and return them, after trying to find the right label for the right order to print and attach and then deliver to UPS. On top of that I have to monitor my credit card to make sure thr correctrefund is made or protest the wrong posting ifthat is not done. All very time consuming with no real live person to talk to and understand my frustration.I have been a loyal Amazon customer despite your order botching and trickery in getting Washingto State residents to pay sales tas, regardless of where the merchandise is actually shipped from, taking your price right out of competiveness in my just buying these things from the store, without any such frustration or delays that I am experiencing, and then ending up paying more money for and gas money and time trying to straighten out.I guess you are too big to be concerned about one single very unhappy customer, but please do note thatI do have a very large following on my writing sites as well as some inside communication ability with some of the executives there.I would be greatly appreciative if you could do something about this problem. Thank you for trying to save a good customer. Bill Cottringer

Reviews.Title: Poor ergonomics
Reviews.Author: R. Johnston
Reviews.Content: It requires one to open and close the monitor screen to make settings and then take photos with the viewfinder.  Not available for a camera one buys for its ability to customize the settings for each group of shots.

ProductInfo.Features:
Powerful 42x zoom that lets you shoot amazing close-ups
Built-in GPS records the location of each shot you take
Wi-Fi WU-1a accessory (not included) allows you to easily share your shots anytime anywhere
18.1 MP CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality and enhanced low-light performance
Record videos in Full 1080p HD with stereo sound
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX P520 18.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 42x Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (Dark Grey)
